message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards. It comes with a range of features designed to enhance your experience. Considering its quality and benefits, I would like to propose a price of $150 for this exceptional item. I believe it offers great value and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the quality of your product. However, I am looking to keep my budget under $100. Would you be able to offer the product at $90?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. To accommodate your needs while still providing you with high-quality value, I am willing to negotiate at $100 for the product. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations and allows us to reach an agreement.
